name: Swolemochao 1 & 2: Gym of the Year Edition
summary:
Ready to get swole? Swolemochao has a workout routine for you! But, it seems there's something odd about him, as if he's testing you more than training you. Find out the truth! Afterwards, find out what happened when Dr. Robotnik finds the fate of Swolemochao's mission. A depressed Player encounters Dr. Robotnik's newest scheme, the Mean Muscle Machine! Can you succeed with the perils that unfold?

Slapped together in a single package, Swolemochao 1 & 2: Gym of the year edition offers both games for you with remastered art and updated gameplay changes to improve upon the original 12 hour made first game, and extra bells and whistles for the not-made-in-12-hours sequel!
